thread.section_title: Fabletics Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fabletics | fabletics.com | 72 of 625
thread.title: Celia Burg

author: Celia Burg
title: Celia Burg
text: The offers were great! I picked my two pairs of leggings, and when I went to checkout I was directed to another page with lots of great offers! I added a tank and a sports bra, which advertised a combined total of $20 together. Then when I went to checkout, the offers had disappeared and the offers I chose came to more than $50 combined! I was not happy. I removed them from my cart and will probably not continue a membership with them due to this issue.
